data.attribute

Class Attribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.attribute.Attribute

  • public class Attribute
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single attribute that an instance can have.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

    • Constructor Detail

      • Attribute

        public Attribute(java.lang.String name,
         int id,
         int type,
         java.lang.String[] nominalValues)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        name - - name of the attribute
        id - - integer id of the attribute
        type - - {nominal, continuous}

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        the name of the attribute

      • getId

        public java.lang.Integer getId()
        Get this attribute's id. In an ARFF file, this ID corresponds to its index in the ARFF header.
        Returns:
        Integer - the attribute's ID

      • getType

        public java.lang.Integer getType()
        Get the attribute's type (i.e. continuous or nominal)
        Returns:
        The attribute's type

      • getNominalValueMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getNominalValueMap()
        Get the attribute's nominal value map. The map's keys correspond to the name of the value and it's values correspond to that value's integer id. If this attribute is continuous, then this method will return null.
        Returns:
        the nominal value map

      • getNominalValueName

        public java.lang.String getNominalValueName(java.lang.Integer attrValueId)
        If this attribute is a nominal attribute, this method will return the name of a nominal value for this attribute given the nominal value ID of that value
        Parameters:
        attrValueId - - The Id of the attribute's value
        Returns:
        the name of the attribute's value with this ID or null if this is an invalid attribute value or the attribute is continuous

      • getNominalValueId

        public java.lang.Integer getNominalValueId(java.lang.String attrValueName)
        If this attribute is a nominal attribute, this method will return an integer corresponding to the ID of this attribute's possible value.
        Parameters:
        attrValueName - - The name of the attribute's value
        Returns:
        Integer - The ID of the attributes value. null - If this is an invalid attribute value or the attribute is continuous
